StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetShipperPostEnlistmentDisclosure]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @ShipperID int ) AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT [ID], [ShipperID], [Disclosure], [DisclosureSourceID], [DisclosureCriteriaID] FROM [USMC].[Shipper_PostEnlistmentDisclosure] WHERE [ShipperID] = @ShipperID
